room_title: Escape room "Submersion" by Conundrum Escape Rooms in Denver
room_description:
Embark on a one-of-a-kind escape mission at Conundrum Escape Rooms. This tough room is great for medium-sized groups of four to eight players and is just waiting for the right team to come along and solve it! Do you have what it takes to brave the room?

Submersion takes you back in time to the year 1942. Currently, the whole world is at war, and youâ€™re serving on a highly classified submarine mission. You and your crew must navigate your submarine through enemy-infested waters to deliver your top secret cargo to our allies. Team up for a death-defying mission to defeat the enemy!

Can you survive? Enter the submarine and find out!
